  • SEARCH: 
 
Packages 
Package Description
application_frames
Contains the frames used to make up the interface of the entire application, including the main application frame, the Settings window, the Attribute Table window and other associated GUI frames.
core_classes
Contains definitions of the atomic elements used to make up the functionality of the application, including Layer and Feature definition.
core_components
Contains the core components of the application.
custom_components
Contains extensions of default Java components that are customized for this application, including an extension of JFrame (CustomJFrame) and JPanel (CustomJPanel)
database
Contains the definition of a PostgreSQL database connection class, which is used to read and write layers to a database representation.
effects
Contains definitions of various aesthetic effects used to supplement the application, including grid lines to be displayed on the canvas (GridLine) and text items used for moving mouse tips at the drawing panel
features
Contains definitions of the individual feature types supported by the application, points (PointItem), polylines (PolylineItem) and polygons (PolygonItem).
file_handling
Contains the Classes used for the File Handling (Import / Export CSV) and the management of the database credentials in an external file
images
Contains images used for icons seen on the buttons and toolbars
models
Contains definitions of the table model objects used to control the tabular data structures in the application.
renderers_and_editors
Contains renderer objects that render the colored patch (GeometryTableIconRenderer) and the remove button (LayerRemoveButtonRenderer) for each layer instance in the table of contents.
tester
This package is only for testing and will be removed before the release !!!
toolset
Contains miscellaneous utilities used throughout the application.
